<script type="text/javascript">
  function setIframeHeight(ifrm) {
    var height = ifrm.contentWindow.postMessage("FrameHeight", "*");   
  }
</script>



<script async="" type="text/javascript">
  window.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
    //Here We have to check content of the message event  for safety purpose
    //event data contains message sent from page added in iframe as shown in step 3
    if (event.data.hasOwnProperty("FrameHeight")) {
      //Set height of the Iframe
      $("#IframeId").css("height", event.data.FrameHeight);        
    }
  });
</script>
<!-- End of Don't know -->

It improves strength and stability, mimicking the action of chopping wood. Ideal for boosting functional strength, body awareness, core stability, and promoting balance and coordination.</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div><div role="listitem" class="collection-item-10 w-dyn-item w-col w-col-6"><div class="div-block-138"><div class="column-116"><a href="/exercises/couch-stretch" class="link-block-33 w-inline-block" data-positional-element-id="28"><div class="small-columns-14 small-columns-19"><div class="quote-26"><div class="heading-and-text-13"><div class="content-123"><div class="frame-227"><div class="text-and-icon-10"><div style="background-color:#C6E1E2" class="tag-21"><div class="content-124"><div fs-cmsfilter-field="category" class="text-153">Mobility</div></div></div></div></div><div class="html-embed-39 w-embed"><img style="" src="https://copilot-exercise-media.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/1280_jpegs/bodyweight_couch_stretch.jpeg" alt="Couch Stretch with trainwell"></div><div fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">Couch Stretch</div><div class="author-job-8">The Couch Stretch is a simple yet effective exercise to help increase flexibility and mobility in your hips and thighs. It is an excellent movement for those who spend a lot of time sitting, as it can help counter the stiffness that can result from being sedentary. The exercise is named so because you can easily use your couch or a similar piece of furniture to perform it.</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div><div role="listitem" class="collection-item-10 w-dyn-item w-col w-col-6"><div class="div-block-138"><div class="column-116"><a href="/exercises/kettlebell-tricep-extension" class="link-block-33 w-inline-block" data-positional-element-id="29"><div class="small-columns-14 small-columns-19"><div class="quote-26"><div class="heading-and-text-13"><div class="content-123"><div class="frame-227"><div class="text-and-icon-10"><div style="background-color:#FFF0D2" class="tag-21"><div class="content-124"><div fs-cmsfilter-field="category" class="text-153">Strength</div></div></div></div></div><div class="html-embed-39 w-embed"><img style="" src="https://copilot-exercise-media.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/1280_jpegs/kettlebell_tricep_extension.jpeg" alt="Kettlebell Tricep Extension with trainwell"></div><div fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">Kettlebell Tricep Extension</div><div class="author-job-8">Kettlebell Tricep Extension strengthens and tones your triceps. It requires strength and stability as your feet slide while your upper body remains static. A challenging, rewarding workout for core strength.</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div><div role="listitem" class="collection-item-10 w-dyn-item w-col w-col-6"><div class="div-block-138"><div class="column-116"><a href="/exercises/dumbbell-lumberjack-squat" class="link-block-33 w-inline-block" data-positional-element-id="59"><div class="small-columns-14 small-columns-19"><div class="quote-26"><div class="heading-and-text-13"><div class="content-123"><div class="frame-227"><div class="text-and-icon-10"><div style="background-color:#FFF0D2" class="tag-21"><div class="content-124"><div fs-cmsfilter-field="category" class="text-153">Strength</div></div></div></div></div><div class="html-embed-39 w-embed"><img style="" src="https://copilot-exercise-media.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/1280_jpegs/dumbbell_lumberjack_squat.jpeg" alt="Dumbbell Lumberjack Squat with trainwell"></div><div fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">Dumbbell Lumberjack Squat</div><div class="author-job-8">The Dumbbell Lumberjack Squat targets legs, hips, and core, mimicking wood chopping motion. The exercise involves pulling the band up close to the body.</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div><div role="listitem" class="collection-item-10 w-dyn-item w-col w-col-6" style="opacity: 1;"><div class="div-block-138"><div class="column-116"><a href="/exercises/kettlebell-arnold-press" class="link-block-33 w-inline-block"><div class="small-columns-14 small-columns-19"><div class="quote-26"><div class="heading-and-text-13"><div class="content-123"><div class="frame-227"><div class="text-and-icon-10"><div style="background-color:#FFF0D2" class="tag-21"><div class="content-124"><div fs-cmsfilter-field="category" class="text-153">Strength</div></div></div></div></div><div class="html-embed-39 w-embed"><img style="" src="https://copilot-exercise-media.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/1280_jpegs/kettlebell_arnold_press.jpeg" alt="Kettlebell Arnold Press with trainwell"></div><div fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">Kettlebell Arnold Press</div><div class="author-job-8">The Kettlebell Arnold Press boosts shoulder and arm strength, increases endurance, and improves balance and posture with added mobility and stability benefits. It involves alternating between two poses: the Cat, where your spine is rounded, and the Cow, where your spine is arched.</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div><div role="listitem" class="collection-item-10 w-dyn-item w-col w-col-6" style="opacity: 1;"><div class="div-block-138"><div class="column-116"><a href="/exercises/single-leg-hamstring-stretch" class="link-block-33 w-inline-block"><div class="small-columns-14 small-columns-19"><div class="quote-26"><div class="heading-and-text-13"><div class="content-123"><div class="frame-227"><div class="text-and-icon-10"><div style="background-color:#C6E1E2" class="tag-21"><div class="content-124"><div fs-cmsfilter-field="category" class="text-153">Mobility</div></div></div></div></div><div class="html-embed-39 w-embed"><img style="" src="https://copilot-exercise-media.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/1280_jpegs/unilateral_bodyweight_hamstring_stretch.jpeg" alt="Single Leg Hamstring Stretch with trainwell"></div><div fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">Single Leg Hamstring Stretch</div><div class="author-job-8">The Single Leg Hamstring Stretch is an excellent exercise for increasing flexibility in the hamstrings, the muscles located at the back of your thighs. fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">Yoga Ball Single Kettlebell Sit Up</div><div class="author-job-8">Perform the Yoga Ball Single Kettlebell Sit-Up for core strengthening and stability. This exercise combines a sit-up motion with a kettlebell lift while balancing on a yoga ball for enhanced coordination.</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div><div role="listitem" class="collection-item-10 w-dyn-item w-col w-col-6" style="opacity: 1;"><div class="div-block-138"><div class="column-116"><a href="/exercises/barbell-thruster" class="link-block-33 w-inline-block"><div class="small-columns-14 small-columns-19"><div class="quote-26"><div class="heading-and-text-13"><div class="content-123"><div class="frame-227"><div class="text-and-icon-10"><div style="background-color:#FFF0D2" class="tag-21"><div class="content-124"><div fs-cmsfilter-field="category" class="text-153">Strength</div></div></div></div></div><div class="html-embed-39 w-embed"><img style="" src="https://copilot-exercise-media.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/1280_jpegs/barbell_thruster.jpeg" alt="Barbell Thruster with trainwell"></div><div fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">Barbell Thruster</div><div class="author-job-8">The Barbell Thruster is a compound exercise targeting the legs, glutes, core, and shoulders. This enhances your arms' muscle endurance and tone.</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div><div role="listitem" class="collection-item-10 w-dyn-item w-col w-col-6" style="opacity: 1;"><div class="div-block-138"><div class="column-116"><a href="/exercises/bridge-stretch" class="link-block-33 w-inline-block"><div class="small-columns-14 small-columns-19"><div class="quote-26"><div class="heading-and-text-13"><div class="content-123"><div class="frame-227"><div class="text-and-icon-10"><div style="background-color:#C6E1E2" class="tag-21"><div class="content-124"><div fs-cmsfilter-field="category" class="text-153">Mobility</div></div></div></div></div><div class="html-embed-39 w-embed"><img style="" src="https://copilot-exercise-media.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/1280_jpegs/bodyweight_bridge_stretch.jpeg" alt="Bridge Stretch with trainwell"></div><div fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">Bridge Stretch</div><div class="author-job-8">The Bridge Stretch is a great exercise for improving flexibility and strength in your lower back, hips, and shoulders. This exercise involves forming a bridge like posture with your body by pushing your hips and torso upwards, while keeping your hands and feet on the ground. It's good for stability, flexibility and can also aid in the relief of back pain.</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div><div role="listitem" class="collection-item-10 w-dyn-item w-col w-col-6" style="opacity: 1;"><div class="div-block-138"><div class="column-116"><a href="/exercises/med-ball-overhead-row" class="link-block-33 w-inline-block"><div class="small-columns-14 small-columns-19"><div class="quote-26"><div class="heading-and-text-13"><div class="content-123"><div class="frame-227"><div class="text-and-icon-10"><div style="background-color:#FFF0D2" class="tag-21"><div class="content-124"><div fs-cmsfilter-field="category" class="text-153">Strength</div></div></div></div></div><div class="html-embed-39 w-embed"><img style="" src="https://copilot-exercise-media.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/1280_jpegs/med_ball_overhead_row.jpeg" alt="Med Ball Overhead Row with trainwell"></div><div fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">Med Ball Overhead Row</div><div class="author-job-8">Med Ball Overhead Row is a potent upper body workout. This movement strengthens and stimulates flexibility in your ankles which helps in improving balance, stability, and aiding in the prevention of ankle-related injuries. It's often used for rehab after injuries to regain mobility and strength in the ankle. One rep consists of moving the foot inwards (inversion) and then outwards (eversion).</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div><div role="listitem" class="collection-item-10 w-dyn-item w-col w-col-6" style="opacity: 1;"><div class="div-block-138"><div class="column-116"><a href="/exercises/dumbbell-shrug" class="link-block-33 w-inline-block"><div class="small-columns-14 small-columns-19"><div class="quote-26"><div class="heading-and-text-13"><div class="content-123"><div class="frame-227"><div class="text-and-icon-10"><div style="background-color:#FFF0D2" class="tag-21"><div class="content-124"><div fs-cmsfilter-field="category" class="text-153">Strength</div></div></div></div></div><div class="html-embed-39 w-embed"><img style="" src="https://copilot-exercise-media.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/1280_jpegs/dumbbell_shrug.jpeg" alt="Dumbbell Shrug with trainwell"></div><div fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">Dumbbell Shrug</div><div class="author-job-8">"Dumbbell Shrug targets the trapezius muscles in the upper back and neck. Regular practice can enhance total body strength and endurance.</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div><div role="listitem" class="collection-item-10 w-dyn-item w-col w-col-6" style="opacity: 0;"><div class="div-block-138"><div class="column-116"><a href="/exercises/standing-hamstring-stretch" class="link-block-33 w-inline-block"><div class="small-columns-14 small-columns-19"><div class="quote-26"><div class="heading-and-text-13"><div class="content-123"><div class="frame-227"><div class="text-and-icon-10"><div style="background-color:#C6E1E2" class="tag-21"><div class="content-124"><div fs-cmsfilter-field="category" class="text-153">Mobility</div></div></div></div></div><div class="html-embed-39 w-embed"><img style="" src="https://copilot-exercise-media.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/1280_jpegs/bodyweight_standing_hamsting_stretch.jpeg" alt="Standing Hamstring Stretch with trainwell"></div><div fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">Standing Hamstring Stretch</div><div class="author-job-8">The Standing Hamstring Stretch is a simple but effective exercise for increasing flexibility in the hamstrings (back of the thighs). This stretch may also help to alleviate tightness in the low back area. The goal of the movement is to gently lengthen the hamstrings without straining.</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div><div role="listitem" class="collection-item-10 w-dyn-item w-col w-col-6" style="opacity: 0;"><div class="div-block-138"><div class="column-116"><a href="/exercises/l-sit-pull-up" class="link-block-33 w-inline-block"><div class="small-columns-14 small-columns-19"><div class="quote-26"><div class="heading-and-text-13"><div class="content-123"><div class="frame-227"><div class="text-and-icon-10"><div style="background-color:#A7B2E8" class="tag-21"><div class="content-124"><div fs-cmsfilter-field="category" class="text-153">Bodyweight</div></div></div></div></div><div class="html-embed-39 w-embed"><img style="" src="https://copilot-exercise-media.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/1280_jpegs/bodyweight_l_sit_pull_up.jpeg" alt="L Sit Pull Up with trainwell"></div><div fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">L Sit Pull Up</div><div class="author-job-8">The L Sit Pull Up challenges your arms, shoulders, and core. Enhancing strength and flexibility, it amplifies core stability and balance. This hard, advanced workout effectively builds upper body strength.</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div><div role="listitem" class="collection-item-10 w-dyn-item w-col w-col-6" style="opacity: 0;"><div class="div-block-138"><div class="column-116"><a href="/exercises/dumbbell-archer-row" class="link-block-33 w-inline-block"><div class="small-columns-14 small-columns-19"><div class="quote-26"><div class="heading-and-text-13"><div class="content-123"><div class="frame-227"><div class="text-and-icon-10"><div style="background-color:#FFF0D2" class="tag-21"><div class="content-124"><div fs-cmsfilter-field="category" class="text-153">Strength</div></div></div></div></div><div class="html-embed-39 w-embed"><img style="" src="https://copilot-exercise-media.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/1280_jpegs/dumbbell_archer_row.jpeg" alt="Dumbbell Archer Row with trainwell"></div><div fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">Dumbbell Archer Row</div><div class="author-job-8">The Dumbbell Archer Row exercise enhances back and arm muscle strength. By mimicking bow-drawing motion, it boosts upper body strength and improves posture.</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div><div role="listitem" class="collection-item-10 w-dyn-item w-col w-col-6" style="opacity: 0;"><div class="div-block-138"><div class="column-116"><a href="/exercises/band-leg-abduction" class="link-block-33 w-inline-block"><div class="small-columns-14 small-columns-19"><div class="quote-26"><div class="heading-and-text-13"><div class="content-123"><div class="frame-227"><div class="text-and-icon-10"><div style="background-color:#FFF0D2" class="tag-21"><div class="content-124"><div fs-cmsfilter-field="category" class="text-153">Strength</div></div></div></div></div><div class="html-embed-39 w-embed"><img style="" src="https://copilot-exercise-media.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/1280_jpegs/band_leg_abduction.jpeg" alt="Band Leg Abduction with trainwell"></div><div fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">Band Leg Abduction</div><div class="author-job-8">Band Leg Abduction is a low-impact workout focused on hip and outer thigh muscles. Stand and move your leg against a band's resistance for improved strength, stability, and balance in these areas.</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div><div role="listitem" class="collection-item-10 w-dyn-item w-col w-col-6" style="opacity: 0;"><div class="div-block-138"><div class="column-116"><a href="/exercises/alternating-band-lateral-raise" class="link-block-33 w-inline-block"><div class="small-columns-14 small-columns-19"><div class="quote-26"><div class="heading-and-text-13"><div class="content-123"><div class="frame-227"><div class="text-and-icon-10"><div style="background-color:#FFF0D2" class="tag-21"><div class="content-124"><div fs-cmsfilter-field="category" class="text-153">Strength</div></div></div></div></div><div class="html-embed-39 w-embed"><img style="" src="https://copilot-exercise-media.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/1280_jpegs/alternating_band_lateral_raise.jpeg" alt="Alternating Band Lateral Raise with trainwell"></div><div fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">Alternating Band Lateral Raise</div><div class="author-job-8">Alternating Band Lateral Raise bolsters shoulder strength, enhances upper body flexibility &amp; stability. This exercise involves lifting arms individually while holding a resistance band.</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div><div role="listitem" class="collection-item-10 w-dyn-item w-col w-col-6" style="opacity: 0;"><div class="div-block-138"><div class="column-116"><a href="/exercises/nordic" class="link-block-33 w-inline-block"><div class="small-columns-14 small-columns-19"><div class="quote-26"><div class="heading-and-text-13"><div class="content-123"><div class="frame-227"><div class="text-and-icon-10"><div style="background-color:#A7B2E8" class="tag-21"><div class="content-124"><div fs-cmsfilter-field="category" class="text-153">Bodyweight</div></div></div></div></div><div class="html-embed-39 w-embed"><img style="" src="https://copilot-exercise-media.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/1280_jpegs/bodyweight_nordic.jpeg" alt="Nordic with trainwell"></div><div fs-cmsfilter-field="title" class="text-block-12">Nordic</div><div class="author-job-8">Nordic exercise is a strength-building workout targeting hamstrings and glutes. Involving kneeling and body movement, it enhances stability and control. Despite initial difficulty for beginners, it's essential for lower body power and muscle definition.</div><div class="buttons-button-20"><div class="text-154">Learn more</div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e4d76f1942cbdc53c0b58a/65ba97793db16cfaadb587ec_Vectors-Wrapper.svg" loading="lazy" width="20" height="20" alt="" class="vectors-wrapper-58"></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div></div><div fs-cmsfilter-element="empty" style="display: none;"><div class="text-block-13">Sorry, there were no results for your search.   function delayScripts(scripts) {
    
    function createScript({url, onLoad, innerHtml, name}) {
      var script = document.createElement("script");
      script.type = "text/javascript";
      if (onLoad !== null){
        script.onload = onLoad
      }
      if (url !== null && url !== ''){
        script.setAttribute("src", url);
      }
      if(innerHtml !== null && innerHtml !== ''){
        script.innerHTML = innerHtml;
      }
      const head = document.querySelectorAll("head")[0];
      head.append(script);
      
      console.log("Added", name, "script");
    };

    function createScripts(scriptsList){
      scriptsList.map(
        function(obj){
          createScript(obj)
        }
      )
    }

    const eventList = [
      "keydown",
      "mousemove",
      "wheel",
      "touchmove",
      "touchstart",
      "touchend",
    ];

    const abTestTimeout = setTimeout(applyAbTests, autoLoadDuration * 1000);
    
    const autoLoadTimeout = setTimeout(function(){createScripts(scripts)}, autoLoadDuration * 1000);
    // Add event listener to each event
    eventList.forEach(function (event) {
      window.addEventListener(event, triggerScripts, { passive: true });
    });

    function triggerScripts() {
      clearTimeout(autoLoadTimeout);
      
      createScripts(scripts);
      eventList.forEach(function (event) {
        window.removeEventListener(event, triggerScripts, { passive: true });
      });
    }
    
    if(document.location.pathname === '/newsletter') {triggerScripts()}
  }
  delayScripts(scripts);
</script>
<!-- End of Delay Script Helper --><iframe height="0" width="0" aria-hidden="true" alt="" style="pointer-events: none; height: 0px; width: 0px; position: absolute; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; visibility: hidden;"></iframe><img src="https://www.ojrq.net/p/?return=&amp;cid=24235&amp;tpsync=no&amp;auth=" height="0" width="0" aria-hidden="true" alt="" style="pointer-events: none; height: 0px; width: 0px; position: absolute; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; visibility: hidden;"><iframe allow="join-ad-interest-group" data-tagging-id="G-6LCQE5GTP6" data-load-time="1717723399337" height="0" width="0" src="https://td.doubleclick.net/td/ga/rul?tid=G-6LCQE5GTP6&amp;gacid=1913853811.1717723399&amp;gtm=45je4650v872112785za200&amp;dma=0&amp;gcd=13l3l3l3l1&amp;npa=0&amp;pscdl=&amp;aip=1&amp;fledge=1&amp;frm=0&amp;z=2123404169" style="display: none; visibility: hidden;"></iframe><iframe id="front-chat-iframe" title="Front Chat" style="position: fixed; border: none; z-index: 99999999; color-scheme: normal; height: 86px; width: 86px; bottom: 4px; right: 9px;" srcdoc="<div id=&quot;front-chat-container&quot;></div><script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot; src=&quot;https://chat-assets.frontapp.com/v1/app.bundle.js?v=3fb1df28&quot;></script>"></iframe><div id="dynamic-react-root"></div></body></html>
